akn:section.akn:heading: Certification of nonhospital residential facilities and outpatient treatment facilities.

akn:content.akn:p: The Mayor shall certify qualifying nonhospital residential facilities and outpatient treatment facilities in the District in accordance with rules issued pursuant to ยง 31-3111.

Each certification issued by the Mayor shall state whether the facility is certified as a provider of treatment for drug abuse, alcohol abuse, mental illness, or a combination of these that shall be specified.
